DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to elucidate the pharmacokinetics and the blood-brain barrier penetration of the elemene.
DOC.brief_title: Blood Brain Barrier Penetration and Pharmacokinetics of the Elemene in Malignant Patients.
DOC.criteria: histopathological or cytopathology diagnosis of malignancy heart, liver and renal function is normal Expected survival time is more than 3 months Signed informed consent exclusion Criteria: non cancer patient accepted elemene administration in 1 month Expected survival time is less than 3 months no Signed informed consent heart, liver and renal function is abnormal
